file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-11-04 - AFT RAMP JACK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AFT RAMP JACK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Aft Ramp Jack. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-51-11-000-801-A AFT RAMP JACK - REMOVAL ALL 23-51-11-400-801-A AFT RAMP JACK - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-11 Page 1 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-11-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. AFT RAMP JACK - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Aft Ramp Jack. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 172 272BR Rear fuselage - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the rear fuselage, RH side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the PA circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Open access door 272BR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four screws (2). (2) Remove the four washers (3). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 2 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the aft ramp jack panel (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 3 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-23-0004 or PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-33-0035 Aft Ramp Jack - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 172 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. SCREW (4) DET. A 3. WASHER (4) 4. AFT RAMP JACK PANEL 145AMM230142.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 4 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. 145-23-0004 and PRE-MOD. S.B. 145-33-0035 Aft Ramp Jack - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONE 172 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. SCREW (4) 3. WASHER (4) DET. A 4. AFT RAMP JACK PANEL EM145AMM231457A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 5 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. 145-33-0035 Aft Ramp Jack - Removal/Installation Figure 403 A ZONE 172 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. SCREW (4) DET. A 3. WASHER (4) 4. AFT RAMP JACK PANEL 145AMM230929.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 6 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-11-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. AFT RAMP JACK - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Aft Ramp Jack. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500 AUDIO SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 172 272BR Rear fuselage - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the rear fuselage, RH side I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the electrical connector (1). (2) Install the aft ramp jack panel (4). (3) Install the four screws (2) and washers (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close door 272BR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the PA circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 7 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Do the Audio System Operational Test ( AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500 - Interphone tests only). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-11 Page 8 of 8 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
